entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: "In 2018, Trump fired Thomas Bossert, whose portfolio included global pandemics. The next month Bolton disbanded the NSC’s global health unit. That meant Trump had no top advisers in the WH w/expertise in global pandemics." https://t.co/VA0o4Ncc3D via @nbcnews
